description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海南省下辖的地级市，也是海南省省会，位于海南省东北部。海口是海南省的政治、经济、科技和文化中心，亦是国家历史文化名城。
description.en: A prefecture-level city and the capital of Hainan Province, People's Republic of China, located in the northeast of the province. Haikou is the political, economic, technological, and cultural center of Hainan, as well as a National Famous Historical and Cultural City.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党海口市委员会书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Secretary of the Haikou Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任海口市人民政府市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Mayor of the Haikou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国人民政治协商会议海口市委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Chairwoman of the Haikou Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任海口市人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Chairwoman of the Standing Committee of the Haikou Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任海口市监察委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Director of the Haikou Municipal Supervisory Commission.

nodes.id: 中国共产党海口市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党海口市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在海口市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Haikou City.

description.zh-cn: 海口市的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of Haikou City.

nodes.id: 海口市人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 海口市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 海口市人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Haikou Municipal People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议海口市委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议海口市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在海口市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Haikou City.

description.zh-cn: 海口市的国家监察机关。
description.en: The state supervisory organ of Haikou City.

description.zh-cn: 清政府与英、法等国于1858年签订的一系列不平等条约，其中规定增开琼州等为通商口岸。
description.en: A series of unequal treaties signed in 1858 between the Qing government and countries including Britain and France, which stipulated the opening of Qiongzhou and other ports for trade.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期广东省的行政管理机构。
description.en: The administrative body of Guangdong Province during the Republic of China era.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府。
description.en: The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 第七届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第七届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第七届最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The 7th supreme state authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最南端的省级行政区。
description.en: The southernmost provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国设立的经济特区，范围为海南岛全岛。
description.en: A special economic zone established by the People's Republic of China, covering the entire Hainan Island.

description.zh-cn: 原为中国海南省下辖的县级市，于2002年10月16日与原地级海口市合并，成为新的地级海口市的一部分。
description.en: A former county-level city under the jurisdiction of Hainan Province, China, which was merged with the former prefecture-level Haikou City on October 16, 2002, to become part of the new prefecture-level Haikou City.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军为占领海南岛与中华民国国军发生的战役，最终解放军占领全岛。
description.en: A military campaign launched by the People's Liberation Army to capture Hainan Island from the Republic of China Armed Forces, resulting in the PLA's control of the entire island.

description.zh-cn: 1926年，广东省政府委员会决议将海口从琼山县分出，设立市政厅，始称海口市。
description.en: In 1926, the Guangdong Provincial Government Committee resolved to separate Haikou from Qiongshan County and establish a municipal hall, officially naming it Haikou City.

description.zh-cn: 根据《天津条约》，海口（时属琼州）被开辟为对外通商口岸。
description.en: According to the Treaties of Tianjin, Haikou (then part of Qiongzhou) was opened as a treaty port for foreign trade.

description.zh-cn: 1950年4月23日，中国人民解放军占领海口，并于同年5月成立海口市军事管制委员会，恢复海口市建制。
description.en: On April 23, 1950, the People's Liberation Army occupied Haikou and established the Haikou Municipal Military Control Committee in May of the same year, restoring the city's administrative status.

description.zh-cn: 海南岛战役导致中国人民解放军攻占海口。
description.en: The Landing Operation on Hainan Island led to the capture of Haikou by the People's Liberation Army.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 1956年，中华人民共和国国务院将海口市划为广东省省辖市。
description.en: In 1956, the State Council of the People's Republic of China designated Haikou as a provincial-administered city under Guangdong Province.

relationships.source: 第七届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 通过关于设立海南省的决议。
description.en: Passed the resolution on the establishment of Hainan Province.

relationships.source: 第七届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 通过关于建立海南经济特区的决议。
description.en: Passed the resolution on the establishment of the Hainan Special Economic Zone.

description.zh-cn: 海南建省后，海口市成为其省会。
description.en: After Hainan became a province, Haikou became its capital.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 国务院批复同意原海口市与县级琼山市合并，成立新的地级海口市。
description.en: The State Council approved the merger of the former Haikou City and the county-level Qiongshan City to form the new prefecture-level Haikou City.

description.zh-cn: 县级琼山市与原海口市合并，组成了新的地级海口市。
description.en: The county-level Qiongshan City merged with the former Haikou City to form the new prefecture-level Haikou City.
